channel.title: Texture problems?
channel.description:
Characters and inanimate objects seem to have no textures and are completely white. [url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96137451']https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96137451[/url]
Edit: It also seems to change to colors other than white, and changes depending on what angle you're looking at.
[url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96141673']https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96141673[/url]
[url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96141760']https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96141760[/url]
[url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142139']https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142139[/url] (Angle 1) [url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142202']https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142202[/url] (Angle 2) [url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142267']https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142267[/url] (Angle 3)

item.title: Texture problems?
item.dc:creator: Spacefish
item.description:
mrjerrio:

Characters and inanimate objects seem to have no textures and are completely white. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96137451

Edit: It also seems to change to colors other than white, and changes depending on what angle you’re looking at.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96141673

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96141760

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142139 (Angle 1)
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142202 (Angle 2)
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142267 (Angle 3)

The first one looks pretty nice, like a glowing suite . But i think you may try to update your graphics driver, or the graphic memory is to small and the textures can´t be loaded…

Read full topic

item.title: Texture problems?
item.dc:creator: mrjerrio
item.description:
mrjerrio:

Characters and inanimate objects seem to have no textures and are completely white. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96137451

Edit: It also seems to change to colors other than white, and changes depending on what angle you’re looking at.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96141673

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96141760

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142139 (Angle 1)
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142202 (Angle 2)
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96142267 (Angle 3)

As it turns out it was a SDK 2007 issue.
